page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: Our area is rural. Our farmers grow cereals such as oil seed rape, maize, wheat and barley. Other crops are grown for seed such as peas, beans and cabbages. At Hullberry Farm there is a dairy farm. They have a prize pedigree herd of cows. The prize herd are Friesians, they are black and white. To identify the cows they have ear tags with a number on and the same number is put inside the cows ear, incase the tag falls out. Each calf is dehorned, and when young its own particular hide pattern is sketched and is recorded. Just like our fingerprints, each pattern is individual. Farmer Alexander, is an expert on Friesians and gives lectures all over the world. We have been to his farm.
